description: Building websites and webapps with reusable components and handling async data, migrating legacy codebases into a maintanable and modernized approach.
Designed product apps for a contactless restaurant ordering and for a local management information system. Built small design system and style guides on both design tool and codebases.
Worked on modernizing company websites and developed internal applications for employees day to day use. As well as dashboard and ordering app for restaurant ecosystem.
Designed and developed a digital butler ecosystem for a hotel, includes TV Application, Hotel management system on front-end side.
